requirements.text: Ensure all key content is easy to edit (names, headings, story text, timeline entries, reasons, gallery captions/images, love letter text, surprise message, and optional music file path) by centralizing them into a clearly named frontend constants/config structure.

quotes:
Technical Requirements:
- Easy-to-edit placeholders for names, text, images, and music

acceptanceCriteria: There is a single, clearly labeled configuration/constants area in the frontend code that contains the editable values.
Replacing placeholder values (e.g., names, dates, image paths, music path) updates the rendered site without hunting across multiple files.

constraints: Frontend must be implemented in React + TypeScript using Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components by composition (do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths).
Backend is not required for this single-page site; do not add backend dependencies unless explicitly needed.
Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.
nonGoals: Persisting reasons/gallery/music selections to the backend canister.
Integrations with external music providers or third-party APIs.
Real-time features (chat, websockets) or multi-page routing.
